mapper.select: select a.id, a.dispatcher_id, a.dispatcher_name, a.worker_id, a.worker_name, a.work_content, a.dispose_content, a.dispose, case state_flag when 0 then '未下发' when 1 then '未完成' when 2 then '已完成' else '未知状态' end as state_flag, case when ISNULL(a.create_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as create_time, case when ISNULL(a.dispath_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.dispath_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as dispath_time, case when ISNULL(a.dispose_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.dispose_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as dispose_time from t_dispatch_log a where 1=1 and (#{condition.id} = '' or a.id = #{condition.id}) and (#{condition.workContent} = '' or a.work_content like concat('%',#{condition.workContent},'%')) and (#{condition.dispathTimeStart} = '' or dispath_time >= case when #{condition.dispathTimeStart} = '' then null else #{condition.dispathTimeStart} end) and (#{condition.dispathTimeEnd} = '' or dispath_time <= case when #{condition.dispathTimeEnd} = '' then null else #{condition.dispathTimeEnd} end) and (#{condition.dispatcherId} = '' or dispatcher_id = #{condition.dispatcherId}) and (#{condition.workerId} = '' or worker_id = #{condition.workerId}) and (#{condition.stateFlag} = -1 or state_flag = #{condition.stateFlag}) order by ${condition.order} ${condition.orderby}
